title: Hierarchically stabilized Pt single-atom catalysts induced by an atomic substitution strategy for an efficient hydrogen evolution reaction
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04457B, Paper
Changle Yue, Chao Feng, Guangxun Sun, Na Liu, Haoyuan Hao, Wenjing Bao, Xiaowei Zhang, Fengyue Sun, Cong Zhang, Jiahui Bi, Yan Zhou, Hsiao-Chien Chen, Yuan Pan, Daofeng Sun, Yukun Lu
Tuning and stabilizing the chemical microenvironment of Pt-based single-atom catalysts is a major challenge in promoting an electrocatalytic hydrogen evolution reaction (HER).
